abstract: Responding to complaints about the automated reading feature in the new Kindle, Amazon says publishers will decide whether to enable it.
snippet: Responding to complaints about the automated reading feature in the new Kindle, Amazon says publishers will decide whether to enable it.
lead_paragraph: Amazon announced today that it would let publishers decide whether they want the new Kindle e-book device to read their books aloud.

headline.main: Amazon Backs Off Text-to-Speech Feature in Kindle
